downloadTitle: MariaDB MySQL Migration and Assessment Tools
downloadDescription: This article explains how to use the python script expimpmysql.py to migrate data from any regular MariaDB Database to Azure for MariaDB

downloadFile.name: MariaDB MySQL Migration and Assessment Tools.zip

detailsSection:
This article explains how to use the python script expimpmysql.py to migrate data from any regular MariaDB Database to Azure for MariaDB.
The features of this scripts are:
1. Fully configurable
2. Extract data to a “tab-delimited” format within a gzip file
3. Import the extracted data that are in gzip file to a target database
4. Configurable parallelism, no of chunks, character set, maximum rows per csv file
5. Selectable tables or all tables 
6. Obfuscated password is stored in a config, so it doesn’t require to re-enter password when performing data migration
7. Generated a logfile
detailsSection_file_name: MariaDB MySQL Migration and Assessment Tools.zip
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a zipped folder that contains MariaDB MySQL Migration and Assessment Tools and associated documentation.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do the following:
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
